column6: THE FANTASTIC PART 1 (OF 6). The Ultimate Fantastic Four - Reed Richards, Johnny Storm, Susan Storm & Ben Grimm - are introduced to the Ultimate Marvel Universe.  But just how do they become the Fantastic Four?
column8: | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | penciller (cover):Bryan Hitch | penciller:Adam Kubert | penciller:Andy Kubert | inker:Danny K. Miki
